children.name: Resume.pdf
children.content:
This is a sample resume content.

John Doe
Software Engineer
Email: john@example.com
Phone: 123-456-7890

Experience:
- Company A (2018-2021): Worked on full-stack applications using React and Node.js.
- Company B (2021-2023): Led frontend team in building responsive UI components.

Education:
- B.Tech in Computer Science, XYZ University, 2014-2018

Skills:
- JavaScript, React, Redux, Node.js, Express
- MongoDB, SQL
- Git, Docker, AWS

Projects:
- File Explorer Web App
- Resume Builder Tool
- Real-Time Chat App

References available upon request.
